body_html:
Hello,
thanks for your answer. In fact support is there but a bit complex to get at. See this interesting article

https://iscinumpy.gitlab.io/post/omp-on-high-sierra/

Otherwise, any suggestion on how to tell bazel to change compiler? But then, should I compile the whole of python with the new compiler?
body_text:
Hello,
thanks for your answer. In fact support is there but a bit complex to get at. See this interesting article
https://iscinumpy.gitlab.io/post/omp-on-high-sierra/

body:
Hello,
  thanks for your answer. In fact support is there but a bit complex to get at. See this interesting article

https://iscinumpy.gitlab.io/post/omp-on-high-sierra/

Otherwise, any suggestion on how to tell bazel to change compiler? But then, should I compile the whole of python with the new compiler?
